hw12 API Contacts¶

async src.api.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactModel, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: UserResponse = Depends(get_current_user)) → Contact¶

Create a new current User’s Contact with the given attributes.

Parameters:

body (ContactModel) – A ContactModel with the attributes to assign to the Contact.

Returns:

A Contact with the assigned attributes.

Return type:

Contact

async src.api.contacts.read_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: UserResponse = Depends(get_current_user)) → Contact¶

Get a current User’s Contact by its id.

Parameters:

contact_id (int) – The id of the Contact to retrieve.

Returns:

The Contact with the specified id.

Return type:

Contact

async src.api.contacts.read_contacts(skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100, first_name: str | None = None, last_name: str | None = None, email: str | None = None, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: UserResponse = Depends(get_current_user)) → List[Contact]¶

Get a list of the current User’s Contacts with pagination. Accepts optional parameters: first_name, last_name, email.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of Contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of Contacts to return.

  • first_name (Optional[str]) – Filter by the first name (optional).

  • last_name (Optional[str]) – Filter by the last name (optional).

  • email (Optional[str]) – Filter by the email address (optional).

Returns:

A list of Contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.api.contacts.read_contacts_with_upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: UserResponse = Depends(get_current_user)) → List[Contact]¶

Retrieve a list of current User’s Contacts who have birthdays in the next 7 days.

Returns:

A list of Contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

async src.api.contacts.remove_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: UserResponse = Depends(get_current_user)) → Contact¶

Delete a current User’s Contact by its id.

Parameters:

contact_id (int) – The id of the Contact to delete.

Returns:

The deleted Contact with the specified id.

Return type:

Contact

async src.api.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdate, db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db), user: UserResponse = Depends(get_current_user)) → Contact¶

Update a current User’s Contact by its id with the given attributes.

Parameters:

  • contact_id (int) – The id of the Contact to update.

  • body (ContactUpdate) – A ContactUpdate with the attributes to assign to the Contact.

Returns:

The updated Contact with the specified id.

  • user (UserResponse) – The owner of the Contact to retrieve.

Returns:

The Contact with the specified id, or None if no such Contact exists.

Contact | None

async get_contacts(skip: int, limit: int, user: UserResponse, first_name: str | None = None, last_name: str | None = None, email: str | None = None) → List[Contact]¶

Get a list of Contacts owned by user with pagination. Accepts optional parameters: first_name, last_name, email.

Parameters:

  • skip (int) – The number of Contacts to skip.

  • limit (int) – The maximum number of Contacts to return.

  • user (UserResponse) – The owner of the Contacts to retrieve.

  • first_name (Optional[str]) – Filter by the first name (optional).

  • last_name (Optional[str]) – Filter by the last name (optional).

  • email (Optional[str]) – Filter by the email address (optional).

Returns:

A list of Contacts.

Return type:

List[Contact]

user (UserResponse) – The owner of the Contacts to retrieve.

A list of Contacts.

verify_password(plain_password: str, hashed_password: str) → bool¶

  • hashed_password (str) – Hashed password.

Returns:

hw12 services Email¶

async src.services.email.send_email(email: EmailStr, username: str, host: str) → None¶

Send verification email to the specified email address to confirm its ownership by username.

Parameters:

  • email (EmailStr) – Email address to verify.

  • username (str) – Username that claims ownership of the email address.

  • host (str) – Application base URL.

async src.services.email.send_reset_password_email(email: EmailStr, password: str) → None¶

Send password reset email to the specified email address with temporary password.

Parameters:

  • email (EmailStr) – Email address to verify.

  • password (str) – Temporary password.
